data.summary: ENOENT root-cause for missing skills source path is addressed by defensive source-root resolution and graceful warning path.

validation.targeted_test: npm test -- --grep "Skills Source Root Resolution" (pass; exit 0; suite includes targeted tests)

regression_risks: Resolver accepts any existing path (not explicitly directory-checked) before use; a file-path collision could still fail later at readdirSync and surface generic deploy error.
Fallback to workspace .github/skills may mask misconfigured primary skills root in some environments by selecting local workspace content.
